Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you came, <MYNAME>!
Would you like to try playing the tune
<RED>"Round the Big Tree"</RED>?
Play
Don't play

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Round the Big Tree</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Ready to stop playing?
Tell me the tune again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll tell you again!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Round the Big Tree</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Play faster!
Don't be such a slowpoke!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Do you want to quit playing?
Continue playing
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I want you to play faster!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Round the Big Tree</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You played it wrong!
Come on, try it again from the top!
Try playing again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, concentrate!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Round the Big Tree</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee-hee-hee.
You hit the right notes!
Great performance!
<PAGE>
So we're going to give you a prize!
Go ahead, Aaron!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
<PAGE>
The prize you get this time is the
ability to use the <RED>big tree</RED>
found in the forest.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll smash open this rock for you!
Hiyaaah!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now you can use it!
<PAGE>
When you hit it with your <GREEN>hammer</GREEN>,
an item will drop out of the big tree!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that cool, <MYNAME>?
Now you can enjoy the benefits of
the big tree!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll let you know when I think of a new
tune.
I'm sure you'll be waiting eagerly!
